name: places/ChIJj9Hwdun8ZUARbS4pqpAS_Qk
adrFormatAddress: 111 8th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Wow, Margaret was so helpful! I went in thinking I would be there for a long time. She showed me how to set up my Chase card on my phone to do quick pay options so quickly! She was so helpful and very friendly. I recommend this place for their customer service.

text.text: Wow, Margaret was so helpful! I went in thinking I would be there for a long time. She showed me how to set up my Chase card on my phone to do quick pay options so quickly! She was so helpful and very friendly. I recommend this place for their customer service.

originalText.text: I arrived at 4:20pm and said I needed to open a new business account (I already have 2 other accounts with Chase). One of the employees  made me sign a list and sit down and wait for 30 minutes. When my turn came, I was told that the business consultant needs to leave home at 5pm and he won't be able to see me today. I complained to the manager who didn't offer any help. This branch is to be avoided unless you're okay doing business with a bank that doesn't value your time....

originalText.text: This is my local branch that I've been using since they opened. Staff is courteous, helpful & very professional. I highly recommend this branch---can't say anything negative about this branch. From the security guard & Chase employee that greets you at the entrance to the staff in the cubicles, this branch stands out from the rest. They have always solved all my concerns/issues relating to banking in a quick & timely manner. 5 stars.

text.text: This is my local branch that I've been using since they opened. Staff is courteous, helpful & very professional. originalText.text: Quiet place on 8th Ave to do your banking business. The issue I have as well as others is that the machines here like other locations have a software and hardware issue. The hardware is antiquated and the software used to operate the machines although antiquated is more current than the machines. Cards tend to get stuck as the machine is resetting.

text.text: Quiet place on 8th Ave to do your banking business. The issue I have as well as others is that the machines here like other locations have a software and hardware issue. The hardware is antiquated and the software used to operate the machines although antiquated is more current than the machines. Cards tend to get stuck as the machine is resetting.

originalText.text: I never write reviews... actually this is my first one but I had to give a shoutout to Patrick. This dude was absolutely amazing with helping me get my account set up and getting everything in order. He was so patient, kind, answered every question and never got frustrated or made me feel rushed. He made me feel like a valued customer and even though initially I didn’t come prepared, he provided secondary options for me to get everything in order and didn’t just say “oh you don’t have it, can’t help you” I see a lot of the negative reviews are from years ago but this entire team there now is 5 STARS and do A+ work. Shoutout to you Patrick, after he helped me out I told him I’d write this. GIVE THAT MAN A PROMOTION!
